00148     class UTF8Marshaler : ICustomMarshaler
00149     {
00150         private string cookie;
00151         private int nativeDataSize = 0;
00152 
00153         public UTF8Marshaler(string cookie)
00154         {
00155             this.cookie = cookie;
00156         }
00157 
00158         public Object MarshalNativeToManaged(IntPtr pNativeData)
00159         {
00160             if (pNativeData == IntPtr.Zero) return null;
00161 
00162             List<byte> bytes = new List<byte>();
00163             byte readbyte;
00164             int i = 0;
00165             while ((readbyte = Marshal.ReadByte(pNativeData, i)) != 0)
00166             {
00167                 bytes.Add(readbyte);
00168                 i++;
00169             }
00170 
00171             byte[] utf8bytes = bytes.ToArray();
00172 
00173             Encoding u8e = Encoding.UTF8;
00174             
00175             return u8e.GetString(utf8bytes);
00176         }
00177 
00178         public IntPtr MarshalManagedToNative(Object managedObject)
00179         {
00180             String inString = (String)managedObject;
00181 
00182             if (inString == null) return IntPtr.Zero;
00183 
00184             Encoding u8e = Encoding.UTF8;
00185             byte[] utf8bytes = u8e.GetBytes(inString);
00186 
00187             IntPtr ptr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(utf8bytes.Length + 1);
00188 
00189             for (int i = 0; i < utf8bytes.Length; i++)
00190                 Marshal.WriteByte(ptr, i, utf8bytes[i]);
00191             Marshal.WriteByte(ptr, utf8bytes.Length, 0);
00192 
00193             nativeDataSize = utf8bytes.Length + 1;
00194 
00195             return ptr;
00196         }
00197 
00198         public int GetNativeDataSize()
00199         {
00200             return nativeDataSize;
00201         }
00202 
00203         public void CleanUpManagedData(Object managedObject)
00204         {
00205         }
00206 
00207         public void CleanUpNativeData(IntPtr pNativeData)
00208         {
00209             if (pNativeData == IntPtr.Zero) return;
00210             Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pNativeData);
00211         }
00212 
00213         public static ICustomMarshaler GetInstance(String cookie)
00214         {
00215             return new UTF8Marshaler(cookie);
00216         }
00217     }
00218 }
